title: Gravitii
description:
This app supports Gravitii drones to meet the needs of aerial photography.

Experience the combination of technology and life, find the inspiration, enjoy the enjoyment at high altitude, travel around the world, record the good times!

Functions:
1. FPV live sharing, photo taking or recording videos 
2. Adjust the gimbal angle, parameter of camera
3. One key share to social media
4. Waypoint，route planning
5. One key take off/land, one key return
6. Display flight speed, GPS, battery life
7. One key switch to altitude, GPS,Follow, etc
8. Beginners’ mode
